sentence: Church & Dwight Company, Inc. ( CHD ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 14, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.218 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 04, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased CHD prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 3rd quarter that CHD has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $55.74, the dividend yield is 1.56%.
The previous trading day's last sale of CHD was $55.74, representing a -3.95% decrease from the 52 week high of $58.03 and a 29% increase over the 52 week low of $43.21.
CHD is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
CHD's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.24.
Zacks Investment Research reports CHD's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 17.35%, compared to an industry average of 9.5%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the CHD Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
